Data.jsonData: {"line":"The chest is locked... You need {requirementAmount} {lockRequirement.ItemName} to open it."}
{"line":"You found {amount} <color={color_item}>{content.ItemName}</color>!!"}
{"line":"You received {amount} <color={color_item}>{content.ItemName}</color>!!"}
{"line":"You have the {requirementAmount} {lockRequirement.ItemName} needed to open it! The chest opens!!"}
{"line":"Play Video?!"}
{"line":"If you're reading this, you're gay!","side":"right"}
{"line":"Combat starting"}
{"line":"HEY?! WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?!"}
{"line":"YOU'RE BANNED FROM HERE, OUT!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/portrait_jimi_3","talkerName":"Jimi","line":"Shit! He caught me... I could technically handle this... But...."}
{"line":"Let me heal you."}
{"line":"Your team has been fully healed."}
{"line":"Do you want to fight?"}
{"line":"No."}
{"line":"Yes."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1", "talkerName":"Jimi","line":"... I really wasted 1,448 pesos on this..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1", "talkerName":"Jimi","line":"Nah, this is actually pretty cool. Totally worth it."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1", "talkerName":"Jimi","line":"I should stop touching it."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Jimi/po_jimi_neutral_1", "talkerName":"Jimi","line":"..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_neutral_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Watch out or I'll smoke you... I'm not kidding, cowboy..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_neutral_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I'm the best shooter in all of Colorado."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_neutral_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I will never return your wallet, you asshole."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Damn, it hurts."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"But- Where's the Maltese???"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I’ll only fight you when he grows a pair and comes to challenge me himself."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Now, you know my biggest secret..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"Here, take your damn wallet."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/EyrCott/po_eyrcott_bald_1","talkerName":"Eyr Cott","line":"I'm out of here."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"You know how to fight, right?"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Use <sprite name=move> to navigate and make your decision with <sprite name=select>."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"You can choose to attack, use a skill, or change position. Go ahead! Try it!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"I'll let you make the decisions, I'll follow you! You look strong, so I think you know what you're doing."}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Watch out for your opponent. You don't have to take the hit. You can block with <sprite name=cancel> and only take half the damage!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Also, if you block at the right time, you can nullify the attack's damage and come out unscathed!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Use the magnifying glass to observe the enemy, each fighter starts with a recipe!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"If you follow the recipe, each step will make your attack stronger!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"I'll reveal the recipe for us. Watch Eyr Cott!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"See that wheel with symbols? That's Eyr Cott's <color={color_success}>Food Wheel</color>!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"It shows the types of ingredients available for any opponent's recipe."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"The chain of symbols above represents the recipe or <color={color_success}>The Food Chain.</color>"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Follow it with your attacks and skills."}

{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Wait- 
 Are you bald too???"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Let me join you!"}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"You’ll have to face this cowboy..."}
{"portraitPath":"Portraits/Yankee/po_yankee_neutral_1","talkerName":"Yankee","line":"Ready to go, I’m one of the crew now!"}
